name: DMTREM (Michelle Lyons)
description:
A Twine game simulating dreams, originally made for a game jam. Reuploaded in October 2021, so I could have something available on my relaunched itch.io account. For other itch.io games made when I was an "egg", see the following links:

https://archive.org/details/TheChriddofSoftwareCollection

https://archive.org/details/santas-excellent-joke-app

https://archive.org/details/complete-garlic-bread-simulator-collection

https://archive.org/details/funny-horsie-episode-26
